page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE IN COLEHILL
page.content: We wake up about 7.50 am. and have a cup of coffee and a bowl of cereal, then Alex, my sister, and I get dressed.Alex goes to school with a friend. I practise the piano, then I walk to school. Mum is then busy with housework. We follow this routine each day, but after school we do different things. On Mondays I go to Cubs and swimming. Tuesdays Alex and I have piano lessons and Alex goes to Guides. We both go to the sports centre on Wednesdays for swimming and Mum talks to her friends. Dad works away from home, but comes back from Hatfield on Fridays, and Mum works at the nursing home.On Saturdays I play football and Alex goes swimming. On Sundays Dad and I fetch the newspaper and then Dad does the gardening.We all have a lovely roast dinner.(CHARLES CAMPBELL) aged 9 years.
